title: 大家好我刚接触这个游戏~
author: akbinlin
txt_content: 大家好我刚接触这个游戏~请多多指教~

replies.author: shamii
replies.txt_content: 新人你好

replies.author: Dou_Bi_
replies.txt_content: 新人你壕，欢迎来到MCBBS。。

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 新人你好！

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content: 新人你好，你可以多看些正确的教程，这样对你的游戏有好处

replies.author: 谈天c
replies.txt_content: 新人你好！新人再见

replies.author: Minecraftian
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人！

replies.author: khghj-b
replies.txt_content: 新人你好啊    欢迎来到mcbbs～

replies.author: lxc0123
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人<kabinlin>进入mcbbs。

replies.author: cvncvn
replies.txt_content: 新人你好，这个游戏很简单的

replies.author: 野崎君
replies.txt_content: 同新混熟

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content: 大家好我3岁了[fly]了[/fly]

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content: 新人你好~~~

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人加入~OAO

replies.author: 音乐家七月天
replies.txt_content: 新人你嚎~

replies.author: xiaoxiaoyouzi
replies.txt_content: 欢迎！欢迎！记着我第一次玩的时候，各种点击树（打木头）后来才知道要一直按着。

replies.author: [NGA]
replies.txt_content: 新人你好~

replies.author: 时光之流
replies.txt_content: 你入了坑就别想走了

replies.author: THE_LOVE爱神
replies.txt_content: 如果有什么不会可以问我。新人再见！

replies.author: Cure
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 紅月阿
replies.txt_content: 刚接触就知道MCBBS 不错。

replies.author: zdragun
replies.txt_content: 你好 虽然我也是新人
新人你好

replies.author: ammandgg
replies.txt_content: 新人你好 记得做任务 会有用的

replies.author: 孤独的菜鸟
replies.txt_content: 新人好，MC是个很牛逼的游戏~~你的机子越好玩得越爽~~
同新，你好

replies.author: 忘了回忆
replies.txt_content: 百度百度指令看看，合成表其实挺形象的，有挺多都是我自己看样子合成的，也可以找玩MC的现实朋友帮助，或者直接找服务器玩家，对了··你会联机么··

replies.author: huangqianqing
replies.txt_content: 新人你好，欢迎入坑，金粒接好，水帖开始

replies.author: 几何君
replies.txt_content: 新人你好~欢迎来到MC和MCBBS这个大家庭

replies.author: 施羽融
replies.txt_content: 新人好，记得看版规，虽然我也是

replies.author: ybb135788
replies.txt_content: 孩子怎么还看喜洋洋和灰太狼的基情

replies.author: denggezuishuai
replies.txt_content: 新人你好，我快半岁了！
现在的新人待遇太好了

replies.author: w2420547863
replies.txt_content: 新人你好 欢迎加入我的世界
